item.title: Ground Proximity Warning System (GPWS) – Terrain Awareness and Warning System (TAWS) – Forward Looking Terrain Avoidance (FLTA) and Premature Descent Alert (PDA) Functions

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided alternate procedures are established and used.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Modify Approach Briefing accordingly for the existing meteorological conditions.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "GPWS TAWS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
